name: Root Sword
description:
A Challenge 2D Platformer Game. Which Player play as  a knight wielded with an Rootcalibur or known as Excalibur. Player have to go to the top of game.

Control

Left Mouse Button Click : Fire roots which will pull player toward the direction.

Hold the button for longer distance of roots.

Right Mouse Button Click : While on the ground and point the cursor to ground. The sword will release a force that launches the player into a jump.

 

Download Link : https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Yur70GstnKlVoswBUVwa9qpB2YI5rdSh?usp=sha...
